about_the_game:
You have to go up 10 floors in some strange elevator.
Stay alert to get to the 10th floor.

An anomaly is an anomaly in an elevator.

1. This building has up to 10 floors.

2. This building is under control. If you see someone, don't talk to them.

3. If you feel anything strange, press the emergency bell immediately

4. Please do not make a fuss in the elevator.

This game was inspired by KOTAKE CREATE's Exit 8 game and was created with a focus on Korean elevators.

FLOOR 10 is a short simulator game in which you must identify repeated elevator anomalies and climb to the 10th floor.

You can only press the emergency bell between the sound of the elevator departing and arriving.

If you do not press the emergency bell when something abnormal occurs, or if you press it when it is normal, you will end up back on floor 0.

The elevator is narrow but you will have to figure it out quickly.

Play time

10~120 minutes

About video distribution

・Distribution is possible to both individuals and corporations without permission.
・Monet generation is possible only when using the functions provided by the video distribution site.
・We would appreciate it if you could include the game name in the video title or live broadcast title.

We are not responsible for any damage resulting from the distribution of this game video.
The contents of these guidelines may change without notice.
GameCharater By Hozzi 3D

name: FLOOR 10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2080

short_description: You have to take some weird elevator to the 10th floor. Stay alert to get to the 10th floor.
